entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight except northwest 30 km/h near the water. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:53 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
